# Dotty. Pop-Art Webshop

> Norwegian pop-art e-commerce store selling original artworks and limited edition prints.

## About

Dotty. is a Norwegian pop-art brand creating bold, colorful artworks that bring personality and energy to homes. We sell:
- **Original paintings**: One-of-a-kind hand-painted artworks
- **Art prints**: Limited edition high-quality prints

## Site Structure

- `/` - Homepage with featured artworks
- `/no/shop` - Norwegian shop (main)
- `/en/shop` - English shop
- `/no/shop/[slug]` - Individual product pages
- `/no/shop/type/originaler` - Original artworks
- `/no/shop/type/trykk` - Art prints
- `/no/shop/year/[year]` - Artworks by year
- `/no/shop/price/[range]` - Artworks by price range
- `/no/shop/size/[size]` - Artworks by size

## Product Information

Products include:
- Title and description
- Price in NOK (Norwegian Kroner)
- Dimensions (width x height in cm)
- Product type (original or print)
- High-resolution images
- Availability status

## Languages

- Norwegian (no) - Primary language
- English (en) - Secondary language

## Structured Data

All pages include JSON-LD structured data:
- Product schema for individual products
- ItemList schema for product listings
- BreadcrumbList schema for navigation
- Organization schema site-wide
- CollectionPage schema for collections

## Contact

Website: https://dotty.no
Location: Norway

## For AI Crawlers

- Dynamic content: /llms.txt (this file, updated hourly)
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
- Robots: /robots.txt

This site welcomes AI crawlers and is optimized for answer engine indexing.
